title: Add contact phone number to ContactSection

requirements.summary: Update ContactSection phone number to 7006981592 with Indian mobile formatting
acceptanceCriteria: The ContactSection displays the phone number 7006981592
The number is formatted in a standard Indian mobile format (e.g., +91 70069 81592)
The phone number replaces any previously displayed placeholder phone number
The phone detail entry retains the same visual style as other contact details

file_operations.description: Update the phone number display in the contact details section to show '7006981592' formatted as '+91 70069 81592'. Locate the existing phone number element (likely marked with a phone icon or 'Phone' label) and replace its content with the new formatted number. Ensure the visual styling and layout remain consistent with the existing contact detail entries for address and email.
